title: Zoologist Beaver Deluxe Bottle
description:
Zoologist Beaver invites you to slip away to a cozy family lodge. A tranquil river encloses the den in its rippling embrace as it glides beneath the blossoms of lush linden trees lining the banks. The breezy aroma of the green, floral grove washes over you, just before you duck inside to be welcomed by leathery hints of musky castoreum*. As it mingles with the moist, woody note of freshly hewn timber, it strikes you just how sexy and dapper this perfume is, and you sink into it, letting yourself be enfolded in its surprising elegance.
Perfumer: Chris BartlettSize: 60 mL / 2 fl. oz. Parfum Concentration: 20% Top Notes: Fresh Outdoor Air, Linden Blossom, Wood Shavings, Wild Vegetation Heart Notes: Damp Air, Dry Wood, Water, Light Musk*Base Notes: Heavy Musk*, Dark Woods, Vanilla, Amber, Castoreum*, Leather*
*Synthetic notes. Zoologist Beaver does not use animal products.
Made in Canada. Product will be shipped from Canada.
Perfumer ﻿Interview
An Interview with Chris Bartlett, the Perfumer of Zoologist Beaver
